group_1.textCenter: Kanagi's injuries look okay.@I'm finished with the first aid...!
From here on, our mission is to protect!
Until Momoko's team takes out the Witch,@we're keeping them glued in place!
Sana and I are stopping them@from moving over here!

group_1.textRight: This damn thing darting around the air is annoyin'...!

group_1.textLeft: Wha-wha!? A wrecking ball came out!@That shield's like a jack-in-the-box surprise!

group_1.textCenter: What's not a surprise is that you are still scattered@around here...
Be careful, or else you will get hurt, okay...!?

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:0001_jump01]Nngh...
Damn, I wanna beat this girl, but I keep messin' up.

group_1.textRight: Now, where will the next one come from, I wonder?
Target change...!

group_1.textLeft: From the right!

group_1.textRight: [surround:0001_jump01][chara:100500:effect_7001_attack02]Incorrect...

group_1.textLeft: [surround:1005A02][chara:100500:effect_7003_damage02][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Uwaa!

group_1.textRight: At this rate, I'll be taking your [textYellow:Kimochi] stone as well.

group_1.textLeft: Who's doin' the taking!?
I've decided I ain't turnin' my back on this digustin'@[textYellow:Kimochi]!

group_1.textRight: That's irrelevant.

group_1.textLeft: That [textYellow:Kimochi] that Felicia decided to carry@is of disgust.
She won't give it to anyone until she finds someone@to entrust it to.

group_1.textRight: Iroha Tamaki...
Oi, she doin' better over there?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, for now Kanagi is okay with the first aid@she was given,
and Hikaru's side is fighting against@Tsuruno's group.
Felicia, you should go over there@and help them out.
I don't think you would make a good match for@Yuna.

group_1.textRight: I wanted to be the one to beat her, but...@Tch, fine, I get it.
Heh heh, you are just too kind, Iroha Tamaki.
At first I thought Yui Tsuruno would be the one@to come defeat me,
but now I'm wondering if you came@because you thought I would kill her.

group_1.textLeft: If you think that's why, please at least@put a little thought into how bad you've been!
The wish of a Magical Girl is a serious@and irreplaceable thing,
and violating her wish, hurting our friend,@we're very angry with you!

group_1.textRight: Then use that anger and hit me.
I'll strike you with all of my anger@and take your [textYellow:Kimochi] stone.

group_1.textLeft: Is this how it went in Futatsugi...?@Trampling on people's wishes...!?

group_1.textRight: Of course.
When a wish is known their weaknesses are@revealed. There's nothing unusual about
making others despair.@The world I've lived in is far different from yours.

group_1.textLeft: ...You did all of that to survive, didn't you...?
You still seek salvation, don't you...?
Then don't you think it's the same for people@outside of Futatsugi...?

group_1.textRight: But we have a grudge,@and have no interest in your salvation.
Because all I desire@is the happiness of Futatsugi's girls.
Besides, it's impossible for everyone to be happy.

group_1.textLeft: But vengeance and happiness are not the same,@Yuna!!
